title: America's disdain for Black men and boys hasn't diminished in the years since Trayvon Martin was killed - CNN
content:
1. America's disdain for Black men and boys hasn't diminished in the years since Trayvon Martin was killed  CNN
  2. President Obama: Trayvon Martin Made America Confront Its Original Sin | NYT Opinion  The New York Times
  3. How George Zimmerman stretched 15 minutes of infamy into a decade of disgust  The Washington Post
  4. Video: Opinion | Trayvon Martin is Still Making America Confront Its Original Sin  The New York Times
  5. Family members reflect on Trayvon Martin's death in CBS Reports special  CBS Mornings
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The New Jersey mall incident occurred just as many prepare to observe the 10-year anniversary of the death of Trayvon Martin, the Black 17-year-old whom George Zimmerman gunned down on February 26, 2012.
